author: Anonymous Atom
title: grade for pset5
question:
I got a 100 on my autograder for problem set 5 and had short TA grading where I was asked one question which i answered correctly.

I still got a 73.68 as my grade

Isn't short TA grading worth 25%? I still ended up getting less than a 75 even though i answered the question correctly and got a 100 on my autograder.

Was there a mistake in the grading?
instructor_answer: As specified in the course syllabus, grading concerns should be directed to cpsc110-admin@cs.ubc.ca.
